description: Retrobot Oscilloscope is a vintage-inspired robot with a charming oscilloscope theme. With its classic buttons, soldier-like appearance, and arms and legs reminiscent of classic designs, this robot is a true testament to the nostalgia of the past. Its screen, featuring a classic display, adds to its retro appeal. Retrobot Oscilloscope is a proud member of the WebtrES club, where it showcases its unique abilities and skills.
name: Retrobot Oscilloscope
